name: WANTED Pistoleros
description:
Dust and try yourself  into a  pistol duel .
At the church bell, be the faster... 

Set up for Oculus QUEST 

I've been working on this project for over a month now and I think I have something "playable". 
There's still a lot to do but I'm alone on it for the moment so you have access to the training session and the solo duel, I'm working on the worshop, the news, the options and the multiplayer mode.
Don't hesitate to download it and tell me what you think about it.
Have Fun!!!
Ps: don't forget to armed your gun.
